dict.acceptation: 进行，进程；行动；诉讼；会议记录；
进行( proceed的现在分词)；前进；（沿特定路线）行进；（尤指打断后）继续说；

sent.orig: The proceeding of the melt front is shown by various positions at different time.
sent.trans: 求得不同时刻熔体前沿位置，从而得到熔体前沿推进过程。

sent.orig: Especially the proceeding of the exchang and the theory when it is working.
sent.trans: 主要分析了其演变过程及电路的工作原理。

sent.orig: The destruction of the rest of the complex was proceeding as rapidly as this café.
sent.trans: 生活区的其它部分的毁灭象这个餐馆一样迅速。

sent.orig: What is the best way of proceeding?
sent.trans: 最好采取什麽方式继续下去？

sent.orig: Responsible for coordinate all departments for daily activities proceeding smoothly, and thethe activities of satisfying guests.
sent.trans: 负责联络各有关部门协调当天工作进程并对接待员作全面督导。
